title: [K-12] Acid-Base E-Learning Module: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemistry knowledge, understanding of pH concepts, and basic principles of acid-base reactions
context.additional_context: Optimized content delivery for smartphone-based learning, with enhanced real-time interaction and formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of acid-base reactions to practical case studies.
Learners can improve their ability to calculate pH and design buffer solutions.
Learners can establish self-directed learning strategies using the Google Classroom platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
